Email OTP verification failed. Authentication is unsuccessful. Finish the flow.

Call sub-routine which sends OTP to the email address and allows user to enter the same OTP on UI. If OTP matches the email verification is successful.
User with entered email address is not registered on authentication server.
User with entered email address already registered on authentication server.

Retrieving email address entered by user on UI.
